description.p: Adds the ability to reorder rows by clicking on the row and dragging it to a new position in the list.

discussion.p: The List control can be configured to all ow the user to reorder rows by dragging them to new locations in the List. The behavior supports either click-and-dragging an entire row or using a handle to reorder the Lists rows.

figure.title: A List control with drag reordering using "Downhold" mode.

description.p: Checking the *[ui:Has drag reorder behavior]* property enables row drag reording. The drag reorder behavior is configured with the [Drag reorder settings].

videos.title: Reorder List Rows by Dragging Row to New Position

description.p: In certain applications where a List control is used, it is necessary to allow the user to reorder the rows in the List. A common user interface pattern used to reorder List rows is to allow the user to drag a row to its new position in the List.
In this video we show how you can add 'drag to move row' behavior to a List control.

page.terms: Reorder Rows by Dragging on Row
